title: Security Software False Positives
partialText: Software developers and end-users are often interested in understanding how to resolve incorrect detections from their antivirus/security software, including Microsoft Defender. Such False Positives (FPs) can disrupt your use of your device by incorrectly blocking innocuous files or processes. title: Security Surfaces
partialText: An important concept in Usable Security is whether a given UI represents a “security surface.” Formally, a security surface is a User Interface component in which the user is presented with information they rely upon to make a security decision. For example, in the browser, the URL in the address bar is a security surface.Continue reading "Security Surfaces"
